text: A BitTorrent client is a program that downloads files using the BitTorrent protocol. The first client, known as BitTorrent, was created by Bram Cohen in the summer of 2001. Programs that use BitTorrent protocol are: *ABC † *Acquisition † *Anatomic P2P † *Arctic Torrent † *aria2 *BiglyBT *BitComet *BitFlu † *BitLet † *BitLord *BitPump † *BitTornado † *BitTorrent 5 / Mainline † *BitTorrent 6 *BitSpirit † *Bits on Wheels † *BitTyrant † *Blog Torrent † *BTPD † *burst!† *CTorrent† *Deluge *FlashGet† *Folx *freeloader † *G3 Torrent † *Halite † *KTorrent *MLDonkey *MooPolice † *Opera *QTorrent† *Qbittorrent *rTorrent *Rufus † *Shareaza † *sharktorrent † *SymTorrent† *Tixati *Torrent Swapper † *TorrentVolve † *Transmission *Turbo Torrent *µTorrent *Vuze *XTorrent † *ZipTorrent† † - this program is no longer being developed ==Related pages== * Comparison of file sharing applications * BitTorrent * BitTorrent tracker * Comparison of BitTorrent clients Category:Software Category:Computer-related lists
title: List of BitTorrent clients
